content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Copper Mining and Smelting Area at position(-28, -61)
Consists of following entities:
- Burner mining drill at (-28.0, -61.0)
- Stone furnace at (-27.0, -59.0)
- Burner inserter at (-25.5, -58.5)
- Wooden chest at (-26.5, -57.5)

### Iron Mining and Smelting Area at position(1, -60)
Consists of following entities:
- Burner mining drill at (1.0, -60.0)
- Wooden chest at (1.5, -58.5)
- Burner inserter at (1.5, -57.5)
- Stone furnace at (2.0, -56.0)

### Smelting Area at position(1, 1)
Consists of following entities:
- Stone furnaces at (1.0, 1.0), (3.0, 1.0)
- Burner inserters at (1.5, 2.5), (3.5, 2.5), (5.5, 2.5)
- Wooden chests at (1.5, 3.5), (3.5, 3.5), (5.5, 3.5)

### Smelting Area at position(2, 7)
Consists of following entities:
- Stone furnaces at (2.0, 7.0), (4.0, 7.0)
- Burner inserters at (2.5, 8.5), (4.5, 8.5), (3.5, 9.5)
- Wooden chests at (2.5, 9.5), (4.5, 9.5)

### Assembly Line Area at position(14, 14)
Consists of following entities:
- Assembling machine at (14.5, 14.5) for copper cable production
- Burner inserters at (14.5, 12.5), (12.5, 14.5), (16.5, 14.5)
- Wooden chests at (14.5, 11.5), (11.5, 14.5), (17.5, 14.5)

### Electronic Circuit Assembly Area at position(21, 15)
Consists of following entities:
- Assembling machine at (21.5, 15.5) for electronic circuit production
- Burner inserters at (19.5, 15.5), (23.5, 15.5)
- Wooden chests at (24.5, 15.5)

### Water System at position(-7.5, 25.5)
Consists of following entities:
- Offshore pump at (-7.5, 25.5)
- Additional offshore pumps at (2.5, 34.5), (2.5, 36.5)
- Multiple pipe groups connecting various parts of the system

### Power Generation System at position(18, 47.5)
Consists of following entities:
- Boiler at (18.0, 47.5)
- Steam engine at (29.5, 51.5)
- Multiple pipe groups for water/steam transport

### Transport System
Multiple belt groups connecting various production areas, with belts running in different directions to transport materials between assembly stations

ERROR TIPS

### Errors with pipe connections
- When connecting pipes between entities, ensure the connection points are valid and within range
- Break down long pipe connections into smaller segments for better control
- Verify that pipe endpoints match with the connection points of machines

### Errors with power systems
- Ensure power generating structures (steam engines) are properly connected to boilers
- Make sure boilers have both water input and fuel
- Connect electrical poles to form a complete power network

### Errors with assembling machines
- Ensure assembling machines are receiving power through the electrical network
- Verify that required input materials are available and being fed correctly
- Check that output storage has sufficient space

### Errors with inserter placement
- Verify inserter pickup and drop-off points align with intended source and destination
- Ensure inserters have fuel when using burner inserters
- Check that inserters are oriented in the correct direction
